summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Construction Warehouse Management System after PyMongo collection fix. Backend APIs now 100% functional including previously failing resource assignment endpoints. Frontend fully functional with successful login, navigation, dashboard, and export features.
passed_tests: Frontend login page renders and authentication works
Frontend dashboard displays correctly with resource counts
Frontend navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Máquinas, Equipamentos, Ferramentas, Viaturas, Materiais, Obras, Relatórios)
Frontend Obras page displays existing obras in table format
Frontend Reports page with PDF and Excel export buttons
Dashboard maintenance alerts display (4 alert elements found)
Resource assignment dialog opens and functions properly
Frontend session management and token persistence

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All UI components, navigation, and integration working)
